languages.text: "Что за мерзость творит дочь Его?" {n}Сестра битвы неверяще шепчет, не отрывая взгляда от чудовищного пиршества Чорды.{/n} "Должна быть... причина..."
"What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."
languages.original_text: "Что за мерзость творит дочь Его?" {n}Сестра битвы неверяще шепчет, не отрывая взгляда от чудовищного пиршества Чорды.{/n} "Должна быть... причина..."

languages.text: “神皇的女儿到底在做什么邪恶的事情啊？”{n}阿洁塔修女盯着库尔达的血肉盛宴，以无法相信的语气低声说道。{/n}“她这么做……肯定是……有原因的……”
languages.original_text: "What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."

traits.locale_text: “神皇的女儿到底在做什么邪恶的事情啊？”{n}阿洁塔修女盯着库尔达的血肉盛宴，以无法相信的语气低声说道。{/n}“她这么做……肯定是……有原因的……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「主の娘が犯している、この忌まわしい行為は何なのだ？」{n}バトルシスターはチョーダの怪物的な饗宴を横目に、唖然と呟く。{/n}「きっと何か…理由があるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."

traits.locale_text: 「主の娘が犯している、この忌まわしい行為は何なのだ？」{n}バトルシスターはチョーダの怪物的な饗宴を横目に、唖然と呟く。{/n}「きっと何か…理由があるはずだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué es este acto tan abominable que está cometiendo su hija?». {n}La Hermana de la Batalla susurra incrédula mientras contempla el festín monstruoso de Chorda.{/n} «Tiene que haber alguna... razón...».
languages.original_text: "What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué es este acto tan abominable que está cometiendo su hija?». {n}La Hermana de la Batalla susurra incrédula mientras contempla el festín monstruoso de Chorda.{/n} «Tiene que haber alguna... razón...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Was ist das für eine schändliche Tat, die seine Tochter da begeht?"{n}, flüstert die Schwester der Schlacht ungläubig, während sie auf Chordas monströses Festmahl blickt.{/n} "Es muss einen ... Grund geben ..."
languages.original_text: "What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."

traits.locale_text: "Was ist das für eine schändliche Tat, die seine Tochter da begeht?"{n}, flüstert die Schwester der Schlacht ungläubig, während sie auf Chordas monströses Festmahl blickt.{/n} "Es muss einen ... Grund geben ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Quelle atrocité Sa fille est-elle en train de commettre ? Il doit y avoir... une explication... » {n}chuchote la Sœur de Bataille d'un air incrédule devant l'horrible festin de Chorda.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "O'nun kızı ne tip mekruh bir şey yapıyor böyle?" {n}Harp Rahibesi, Chorda'nın canavarca ziyafeti karşısında şaşkınlık içinde fısıldıyor.{/n} "Bir... Bir sebebi olmalı."
languages.original_text: "What is this abominable act His daughter is committing?" {n}The Sister of Battle whispers incredulously as she stares at Chorda's monstrous feast.{/n} "There must be... a reason..."
